title: Bug 116744 - Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: The bug report is incomplete and lacks specific details about the problem. Further information is needed to provide a clear and complete report.
OB: Dynamic text element doesn't display the DB field content correctly for different content types.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the application and navigate to the page where the dynamic text element is used.
2. Verify that the dynamic text element is correctly configured to display the contents of the DB field.
3. Check the displayed content for the three different content types mentioned (HTML text within <html> tag, HTML fragments not within <html> tag, and text with RTF tags).
4. Observe that the dynamic text element doesn't correctly display the content for all three content types.
